sentences.en: But then to be let down like that, oh it's so unfair!
sentences.cn: 但是接下来竟让人如此失望，唉，这真不公平！

sentences.en: He is seeking redress for what he alleges was an unfair demotion.
sentences.cn: 他要求纠正他所声称的不公正的降级这一错误。

sentences.en: He said in reply that the question was unfair.
sentences.cn: 他回答说这个问题不公平。

sentences.en: I can't imagine you being unfair to anyone, Leigh.
sentences.cn: 利，我想象不出你会对谁不公正。

sentences.en: I really do feel that some people are being unfair.
sentences.cn: 我真的觉得一些人处事不公。

sentences.en: It was damnably unfair that he should suffer so much.
sentences.cn: 他遭受了这么多的痛苦，真是太不公平了。

sentences.en: It was unfair that he should suffer so much.
sentences.cn: 他受这么多苦，太冤枉了。

sentences.en: It was unfair to judge her on such a brief acquaintanceship.
sentences.cn: 你刚认识她就对她作出评价，这是不公平的。

sentences.en: laws aimed at preventing unfair competition
sentences.cn: 旨在防止不公平竞争的法令

sentences.en: Many employers have recognized that age discrimination is unfair.
sentences.cn: 许多雇主已经认识到年龄歧视是不公平的。

sentences.en: She was awarded £5,000 in compensation for unfair dismissal.
sentences.cn: 她获判5,000英镑，作为遭到无理解雇的补偿。

sentences.en: She won £20,000 for unfair dismissal(= being illegally made to leave your job ).
sentences.cn: 她因被不公平解雇而得到两万英镑的赔偿。

sentences.en: Some have been sentenced to long prison terms after unfair trials.
sentences.cn: 有些人被冤判长期徒刑。

sentences.en: The criticism is both unfair and unhelpful.
sentences.cn: 批评既不公正又无济于事。

sentences.en: They are always bleating about "unfair" foreign competition.
sentences.cn: 他们总是抱怨“不公平的”外国竞争。

sentences.en: Unfair bosses and rude customers make us unhappy on the job.
sentences.cn: 不公正的老板和粗鲁的顾客让我们工作起来很不愉快。

sentences.en: Well, I thought she was a bit unfair about me.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我觉得她对我有点不公平。

trans.tran_en: not right or fair, especially because not everyone has an equal opportunity
